snippet: The director of Unesco called Friday for President Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, of Equatorial Guinea, to withdraw the controversial prize he has endowed for the organization.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

lead_paragraph: The director of Unesco called Friday for President Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, of Equatorial Guinea, to withdraw the controversial prize he has endowed for the organization.

headline.main: Unesco Director Asks Dictator to Withdraw Science Prize
headline.print_headline: Unesco Director Asks Dictator To Withdraw Science Prize
